articles.author: Leigh Ann Caldwell
articles.title: Trump wanted Pence to reject votes for Biden. A new bill would prevent that.
articles.description: The proposed bill, titled the Electoral Count Reform and Presidential Transition Act, states that the role of the vice president in counting electoral votes is purely ceremonial.
articles.content:
Comment on this story
A bipartisan group of 16 senators on Wednesday released legislation that would clarify an 1887 law that President Donald Trump and his allies tried to use as part of their atte… [+6216 chars]

articles.author: Melissa Quinn
articles.title: House passes same-sex marriage bill, with 47 Republicans and every Democrat voting in favor
articles.description: The Respect for Marriage Act would provide federal protections for same-sex and interracial couples. Senate Democrats are gauging GOP support for the measure, and the White House supports the bill.
articles.content: Washington — The House on Tuesday passed the Respect for Marriage Act, which would protect marriage equality by repealing the Defense of Marriage Act (DOMA) and providing federal protections for same… [+6679 chars]

articles.author: Miriam Jordan
articles.title: New Findings Detail Trump Plan to Use Census for Partisan Gain
articles.description: A new trove of memos and emails suggest that the plan to add a citizenship question to the 2020 census aimed to cause an undercount that would favor Republicans.
articles.content: The final memo reached the opposite conclusion of the initial draft, asserting that there is nothing illegal or unconstitutional about adding a citizenship question and claiming, There are bases for … [+1268 chars]

articles.author: Kevin Breuninger
articles.title: Secret Service gave just one text message thread to Jan. 6 probe in response to subpoena
articles.description: The committee issued the subpoena after being told that Secret Service texts from around the time of the riot had been erased.
articles.content: The U.S. Secret Service handed over just one text message thread in response to a subpoena issued by the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, Capitol riot, according to a letter obt… [+4166 chars]
